meanings.sent1: The ungiving person never shares their toys with others.
meanings.sent2: She is known for her ungiving nature when it comes to helping those in need.
meanings.sent3: The birthday party was quite ungiving with no cake or presents.
meanings.sent4: The barren land remained ungiving, refusing to yield any crops.
meanings.sent5: His ungiving attitude left everyone feeling unappreciated and neglected.

meanings.definition: Lacking generosity or willingness to give
meanings.sent1: The ungiving millionaire refused to donate to charity.
meanings.sent2: Her ungiving behavior towards her friends made them feel unvalued.
meanings.sent3: The ungiving boss never approved any time off requests.
meanings.sent4: His ungiving heart was like a locked chest, unwilling to share any love.
meanings.sent5: The ungiving nature of the company's policies left employees feeling unappreciated.

meanings.sent1: The ungiving soil failed to grow any plants despite the efforts.
meanings.sent2: The experiment was unsuccessful due to the ungiving data collected.
meanings.sent3: The negotiation was ungiving, leading to no agreement being reached.
meanings.sent4: Her ungiving efforts in the project resulted in no progress being made.
meanings.sent5: The ungiving weather conditions prevented any outdoor activities from taking place.
